name: Lisa
desc:
"Witch of Purple Rose" Lisa

Pursuing the arcane mysteries of magic, and waiting quietly for an encounter with truth.

customize.name: Lisa
customize.desc:
"Witch of Purple Rose" Lisa

Pursuing the arcane mysteries of magic, and waiting quietly for an encounter with truth.

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text: Can also be exchanged using a

customize.name: Blank Dynamic Card
customize.desc: A blank card with a painted back. It is said that if you put the name of your desired dynamic card on this blank card, you can get the very skin from the Association agent located at the tavern.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"These kinds of card games are a perfect little diversion. Are you ready? I'm going to want you to play more than one game with me, you know..."
<color=#ece5d8>Hint: Lisa's deck is good at using Equipment Cards and Support cards to adjust resources while frequently switching Characters and triggering the Quicken reaction.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Lisa
customize.desc:
"Witch of Purple Rose" Lisa

Pursuing the arcane mysteries of magic, and waiting quietly for an encounter with truth.

customize.name: Fischl
customize.desc:
"Fischl, Prinzessin der Verurteilung!" Fischl

"Oz, mine familiar, spread thine wings and weave for me a new fate in the gloom of this night!"

"Mein Fräulein, you cannot expect me to fetch you a replacement card…"

customize.name: Collei
customize.desc:
"Sprout of Rebirth" Collei

"'Shouting the name of your card loudly will increase its power many-fold'… You've got to be kidding, right?"

customize.name: Match Invitation Letter
customize.desc: You can select a player from the Player List via the invitation board, and then entrust The Cat's Tail to send out an invitation using this Invitation Letter. The invited player will head over to the tavern and wait for a duel with you.

customize.name: Lisa
customize.desc:
"Witch of Purple Rose" Lisa

Pursuing the arcane mysteries of magic, and waiting quietly for an encounter with truth.

customize.name: Pulsating Witch
customize.desc:
Lisa: Pulsating Witch

As a Librarian who has read through tens of thousands of volumes, of course it's trivial for me to remember how to win...

customize.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Achieve victory with characters defeated less than twice during the battle</color>

customize.name: Pulsating Witch
customize.desc:
Lisa: Pulsating Witch

As a Librarian who has read through tens of thousands of volumes, of course it's trivial for me to remember how to win...

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"My my, you're pretty good at cards, aren't you, cutie? Then I guess I'll have to stop going easy on you..."
<color=#ece5d8>Special Rule: "Lisa" starts with the Talent Card "Pulsating Witch" equipped.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

Reach Player Level 7

customize.name: Player EXP
customize.desc: Obtained by winning Genius Invokation TCG matches. Every duel you won builds upon the paths to victory, such is the act of earning experience itself. To know how to overcome and subdue the adversary in any situation is the greatest strength that a player can possess.

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Normal Attack</color>
Deals 1 <color=#ffacff>Electro DMG</color> :
If this Skill is a <color=#ffffff>Charged Attack</color> : Attach <color=#ffffff>Conductive</color> to the opponent's active character.
<color=#ece5d8>Conductive</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
This status starts with 2 stacks of Conductive. When attached repeatedly, Conductive stack +1. Conductive can be stacked to a maximum of 4 stacks.
<color=#ffffff>End Phase:</color> Accumulate 1 stack of Conductive.
<color=#ffffff>When the character attached with Conductive takes DMG from Violet Arc:</color> Remove this status and DMG +1 for each stack of Conductive.

<color=#ffd780>Elemental Skill</color>
Deals 2 <color=#ffacff>Electro DMG</color> .
If Conductive is not attached to the opponent's active character, <color=#ffffff>Conductive</color> will be attached.
<color=#ece5d8>Conductive</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
This status starts with 2 stacks of Conductive. When attached repeatedly, Conductive stack +1. Conductive can be stacked to a maximum of 4 stacks.
<color=#ffffff>End Phase:</color> Accumulate 1 stack of Conductive.
<color=#ffffff>When the character attached with Conductive takes DMG from Violet Arc:</color> Remove this status and DMG +1 for each stack of Conductive.

<color=#ffd780>Elemental Burst</color>
Deals 2 <color=#ffacff>Electro DMG</color> . Summons <color=#ffffff>Lightning Rose</color> . The opponent's active character gains <color=#ffffff>Conductive</color> .

Applies Electro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
[ <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> + <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Overloaded</color> : DMG +2 for this instance, the target is forcibly switched to the next character
[ <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> + <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Superconduct</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
[ <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> + <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Electro-Charged</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
[ <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> + <color=#99ff88>Dendro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Quicken</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [ <color=#ffffff>Catalyzing Field</color> ] that grants +1 DMG to the next 2 instances of Dendro or Electro DMG

<color=#ece5d8>Charged Attack</color>
Before your Action Phase, should the total number of your Elemental Dice be even, your Normal Attack will be considered a Charged Attack.
<color=#ece5d8>Usage(s)</color>
After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#ffffff>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.
This card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#ffffff>Usages</color> remaining.

value.name: Pulsating Witch
value.desc:
Lisa: Pulsating Witch

As a Librarian who has read through tens of thousands of volumes, of course it's trivial for me to remember how to win...

value.text: Reward for inviting Lisa to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

value.name: Lisa
value.desc: The languid but knowledgeable Librarian of the Knights of Favonius, deemed by Sumeru Akademiya to be their most distinguished graduate in the past two centuries.
